data.title: Beasley Media Group announces senior appointments
data.meta_description: Beasley Media Group announces senior appointments
data.text:
Beasley Media Group has announced leadership promotions in the company’s Philadelphia-based radio cluster. Jim Antes has been promoted to director of sales, and Greg Beran has been named as digital sales manager with immediate effect.

Antes most recently served as director of new business development on behalf of the radio cluster. In his new role, he will oversee the sales efforts of the company’s Philly-based radio properties, including WMMR-FM, WMGK-FM, WXTU-FM, BEN-FM, and 97.5 The Fanatic.

In his new position, Beran will lead the Philly cluster’s digital sales effort. He previously served as a senior digital account executive within the company’s digital director sales division.

“I am honored and thrilled to lead this dynamic sales team as the new director of sales,” said Antes. “I am truly blessed to represent some of Philadelphia’s most iconic radio stations. With a focus on innovation, customer satisfaction and strategic growth through our audio platforms and digital marketing, I am excited to drive our sales initiatives to new heights. Together, we will build on our success and continue to deliver exceptional value to our clients and listeners.”

Beran added, “I am grateful for the opportunity to be part of the leadership team for these incredible brands. Beasley has created an unmatched culture in Philadelphia, and I look forward to working with this team of marketing experts on growing digital revenue through our full-service approach and creative ideas.”

“Jim’s leadership and passion have been a driving influence within our company, making him the perfect choice for director of sales,” said Cluster Manager Paul Blake. “Jim’s ability to inspire and motivate his team and his deep understanding of the market positions him to lead our sales division to new heights. His exceptional ability to build strong relationships with advertisers and employees has been instrumental in our success and will continue to drive our growth.”

Blake added, “We are equally excited to highlight Greg’s rising star status as a digital leader. Greg has grown within our company, consistently demonstrating innovative thinking and a keen understanding of the digital landscape. His commitment to excellence and ability to drive digital sales initiatives have set him apart as a dynamic and influential leader. Greg’s promotion to digital sales manager is a testament to his hard work, creativity and strategic mindset, which will play a crucial role in our continued success in the digital arena.”
